name: Kielbasa with Honey Mustard
author: Megan
summary: This is another odd kielbasa recipe that surprises everyone.  It's always a winner at parties. The best type of honey mustard for this recipe is a mustard with more honey texture than mustard. Very easy.
directions: Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Slice kielbasa diagonally into 1/4 inch pieces
In a medium-size skillet saute kielbasa in ginger ale until they are heated through
Arrange the kielbasa on the prepared baking sheet, then sprinkle them with brown sugar
Broil the kielbasa until the brown sugar melts and begins to crystallize, check after 3 to 5 minutes
Serve the kielbasa with honey mustard for dipping
